meanings.definition: Competing for superiority in a contest or rivalry.
meanings.sent1: The vying teams were determined to win the championship.
meanings.sent2: The vying athletes were all aiming for the gold medal.
meanings.sent3: The vying students made the spelling bee competition intense.
meanings.sent4: The vying companies battled fiercely for the top spot in the market.
meanings.sent5: The vying siblings constantly fought for their parents' attention.

meanings.definition: Striving for something eagerly or in a determined way.
meanings.sent1: She was vying for the promotion by working hard every day.
meanings.sent2: The students were vying to be the first to finish the race.
meanings.sent3: He was vying for the last piece of cake at the party.
meanings.sent4: The birds were vying for the best spot on the feeder.
meanings.sent5: The chef was vying to create the most delicious dish in the competition.
